channel.title: My hitpoints wont stay normal
channel.description:
I need help finding where my problem is happening.
My char has 88hp's, I eat food, so im 88/88, Save and log back in and im 10/88, It allways happens, And when I die It should go to 88/88 but still 10/88, I've searched for the number '10' eveywhere but I can't find anything that would make this happen.. It just keeps setting it to 10/ whatever... and I don't know where this prob is happening.
Also, How do I make a timer that does somthing every 45 secs. & where do I modify NPC/Player max hits, the jad only hits 10ish.. ty.

item.title: My hitpoints wont stay normal
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

Yeah, It’s a pain, it’s when you level up, die, and log back in… I can’t find it so im going to use a new source lol.

Read full topic
